name: Sensible Bood Rugby Sevens
description:
An hommage to classic arcade soccer games from the 90s , but adapted to the olympic sport of rugby sevens !

For a better experience, it's recommended to play with joysticks.
!! The 2 player mode requires at least one joystick. !!


But you can always play with keyboard ::
Default keys are : ESDF to move ,
when attacking : IO to pass left and right / K to Tackle / L to accelerate
when defending : I to switch player closer to the ball, O to switch player , K to Tackle , L to accelerate.
